p: COVID-19 is atypical pneumonia that is no longer confined to Wuhan or China, but as of March 13, 2020 has spread to 127 countries and territories around the world ( Worldometer, 2020, March 13). Consequently, associated mental health problems would affect a larger community directly. That is why it is very important to implement a multi-faceted approach at the personal, social and international levels promptly. This current study addresses COVID-19 adhering psychological problems with 5 recommendations.
